articles.description: The decision by Asia’s richest banker to start his own business was unusual in an economy dominated by family dynasties
articles.content:
If not for a cricket ball to the skull, Uday Kotak might never have become one of modern Indias most successful finance entrepreneurs.
The speeding projectile that hit him during a match at business… [+7789 chars]

articles.title: Suprajit Engineering Q2 FY24 results: profit falls by 24.02% YOY | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Suprajit Engineering Q2 FY24 results: Revenue decreased by 1% YoY & profit decreased by 24.02% YoY
articles.content: Suprajit Engineering declared their Q2 FY24 results on 09 Nov, 2023. The topline decreased by 1% & the profit decreased by 24.02% YoY. As compared to the previous quarter the revenue grew by 4.29… [+2290 chars]
